entry.title: Wireless Wifi Adapter with Bluetooth 4.0 for PC Laptops, Support Win 7/8/8.1/10/XP/vista/Linux
entry.summary:
Vendor: XpressTronics
Type: Miscellaneous
Price: 4.99

  • The mini Bluetooth WiFi adapter complies with IEEE 802.11n(draft 2.0), IEEE 802.11g, IEEE 802.11b standards, which can provide ultra-fast 150Mbps data transmission for ideal performance when streaming HD video, gaming online, chatting and surfing the Internet, etc.
  • Intelligent AP conversion function, sharing network. Converts the cable network into a WiFi signal to computers, tablets, iPads, and Smartphones.
  • The latest USB WiFi card with RTL8723 BU Chip allows you to easily install, you just need to plug and play Wi-Fi access for your computer or device.
  • The mini Bluetooth receiver offers the function of encryption that enables to secure the security for protecting your privacy.
  • Compatible with Windows 2000 / XP / VISTA /WIN 7/ 8/ 10 /, LINUX / MAC Operating Systems. (it supports USB 2.0 or 1.1). An essential and practical accessory for home, office, studio, hotel, or café).

entry.title: Universal Worldwide International Travel Adapter Plug with Dual USB Port (1000mAh)
entry.summary:
Vendor: XpressTronics
Type: Car & Home Chargers
Price: 6.99

  • Universal Adapter Worldwide: This travel adapter converts power outlets only, not support convert voltage. You can always use "TeImo" travel adapters free to charge your devices including your iPhone, laptop, computer, MP3 player, smartphones and etc while traveling worldwide in more than 150+ countries.
  • Specification: 2 USB port output 1000mA max. travel adapter max power rating is 6A, the voltage between 100-240V. (660W max at 110Vac and 1380W max at 230Vac) Please make sure that the power outlets you intended to use have the proper voltage to run your devices before using the adapter to avoid possible damage to your devices.
  • 3 Devices Charge at Once: 1 Universal input and 2 standard USB ports allow simultaneous multi-device charging at high speed, automatically matches the maximum charging current of the connected devices. The red light will turn on when plugged well.
  • Portable & Lightweight: With all plug pins retractable and weighs only 0.22 lbs, the size is 1.6* 2*3 inches. Easy to put in bag and luggage. This is a true portable travel adapter for travel, business, and home use. No need to carry an extra adapter for your traveling, saving your suitcase space.
  • Safety Precautions:
  • Make sure your hands are dry before using the "TeImo" Travel Adapters.
  • Keep this away from children.
  • Do not connect more than one plug at a time when using the product.
  • This International Travel Adapter does not convert Voltage. Make sure that the power outlet you intended to use has the proper voltage to run your devices before using the adapter to avoid possible damage to your device.

entry.title: Universal Worldwide International Travel Adapter Plug
entry.summary:
Vendor: XpressTronics
Type: Car & Home Chargers
Price: 3.99

  • Stop carrying multiple adapters and make traveling convenient with this SmartPro all-in-one world travel adapter. Compact and lightweight, this power adapter makes a perfect travel companion wherever you go.
  • It is compatible with Australian, UK, Spain, US, and Japanese style plugs, making it one of the most useful and versatile plug adapters. In short, it is designed to suit the power plugs used in over 150 different countries, so you just don’t need to worry about connectivity issues when you travel abroad.
  • This travel adapter also has a built-in surge protector to prevent power fluctuations from harming your charging gadgets. The child protection safety shutter incorporated in this adapter comes in handy in places where the power outlets are within the reach of kids.
  • Its power indicator light lets you know if the plug is turned on/off and its open and lock switches are a great way to ensure safety. SmartPro all-in-one world travel adapter is your one-stop accessory for all your power adapter needs when you’re away from home.

entry.title: USB Wall Adapter (White)
entry.summary:

Type: Car & Home Chargers

Power up at any standard 110-volt wall outlet with this Apple cube-style USB power adapter. This compact power adapter is designed to work with any USB-to-Lightning cable, and it provides 5 watts of energy to charge Lightning-compatible Apple devices. This adapter also works with other USB cables to charge your headphones, ebook readers, and other electronic devices.
  • Included items: Power adapter
  • Compact design
  • Proficient charging
  • Dimensions: 2 inches high x 2 inches wide x 2 inches long
